head.supplied: ¶ Dr Ferdinand Mueller dedicates to you his genus Owenia — a very remarkable one in [...] — in the 9th vol of Hookers Kew Journal of Botany describing 4 species to then be added a 5th in his Fragment...

div.p: From George Bentham to Richard Owen
ML DOC.1567, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

Greeting?? Ending??
Dr Ferdinand Mueller dedicates to you his genus Owenia — a very remarkable one in [...] — in the 9th vol of Hookers Kew Journal of Botany describing 4 species to then be added a 5th in his Fragmenta Phytographiae Australis v. 3., when he also described one of the former ones under a new name the whole are contained in the 1st vol. of my Flora Australiensis p. 384 to 386.
